Package com.apgar.common.lib.constants

Class EnvironmentVariablesConstants

java.lang.Object
com.apgar.common.lib.constants.EnvironmentVariablesConstants
public class EnvironmentVariablesConstants extends Object
This class defines constants for common environment variable names.

It contains various environment variable names related to database connections, email configurations, Active Directory settings, Google Maps API, elastic search, and environmental types.

Author:
APGAR Consulting
